itemListElement.name: Everything Bagel Vegan Cheese Ball – 10 Minute – No soaking, straining

@graph.name: Everything Bagel Vegan Cheese Ball - 10 Minute
@graph.description: Everything bagel Seasoning Vegan Cheese Ball. No soaking, blending, straining needed! 10 minute vegan cheese ball. Gluten-free. Can be soy-free
recipeIngredient: 1 cup almond flour (, super fine if possible)
1 clove of garlic minced or crushed
1 tbsp unsweetened non dairy yogurt  (or use water starting with 2 tsp)
1/2 tsp miso (, white mellow miso or use chickpea miso to make soyfree)
1 tbsp or more everything bagel seasoning (,(see note to make your own))

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the dry ingredient to a bowl (almond flour to black pepper) and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the dry ingredient to a bowl (almond flour to black pepper) and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the ingredients except bagel seasoning and mix well. Get your hands in there to press and knead into a dough. Taste and add more lime juice if needed. If the mixture is too crumbly, add a few drops of water or non-dairy yogurt at a time and press and knead to make a ball.. (add more moisture for creamier cheeseball)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the ingredients except bagel seasoning and mix well. Get your hands in there to press and knead into a dough. Taste and add more lime juice if needed. If the mixture is too crumbly, add a few drops of water or non-dairy yogurt at a time and press and knead to make a ball.. (add more moisture for creamier cheeseball)

recipeInstructions.text: Brush oil or aquafaba. Roll into everything bagel seasoning or sprinkle some on the ball and pat. Or use a different coating of choice or no coating.
recipeInstructions.name: Brush oil or aquafaba. Roll into everything bagel seasoning or sprinkle some on the ball and pat. Or use a different coating of choice or no coating.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 200 degrees F for 35 to 40 mins. Cool for 10 minutes before serving. Or refrigerate for a few hours for flavor to develop more and serve when needed at room temp. The ball can be stored refrigerated in a closed container for upto 4 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 200 degrees F for 35 to 40 mins. Cool for 10 minutes before serving. Or refrigerate for a few hours for flavor to develop more and serve when needed at room temp. The ball can be stored refrigerated in a closed container for upto 4 days.
